Title: Kang Bramblestaff
Description:
Kang's pride regularly becomes overconfidence, which often leads him down dangerous paths. His current path is as dangerous as any - he is headed deep into the Krasarang Wilds.

I wouldn't normally ask a favor of a stranger, but... would you make sure that he is well? It would give me relief to know that a brave $r was looking out for him.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Find Kang Bramblestaff at The Incursion in the Krasarang Wilds.
RewardText: I'm pretty sure this settlement wasn't here a few weeks ago. Where did these people come from?
